title: Joel Matip's Cameroon Refusal Discussed by Hugo Broos After AFCON 2017 Win
text: Joel Matip's Cameroon Refusal Discussed by Hugo Broos After AFCON 2017 Win Nigel Roddis/Getty Images Chris Laker   Liverpool defender Joel Matip may regret missing out on Cameroon's Africa Cup of Nations triumph, coach Hugo Broos has said. Cameroon beat Egypt 2-1 in Libreville, Gabon, on Sunday thanks to a winner from Vincent Aboubakar, but Matip —a leading name in African football — was one of nine players to snub the opportunity to represent the Indomitable Lions before the tournament began. Per Jonny Singer of Mail Online, Broos said: "There was a lot of trouble before, players who wouldn't come with us. OK, it's their decision. But maybe they are saying now to themselves, 'S--t! Why didn't I go with them?'" More to follow.
